member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Configuration.ConfigurationException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs in a configuration setting.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Configuration.ConfigurationException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Configuration.ConfigurationException class.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Configuration.ConfigurationException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Configuration.ConfigurationException class with the specified error message.
member.param: The message to display to the client when the exception is thrown.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Configuration.ConfigurationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Configuration.ConfigurationException class with the specified error message and System.Exception.InnerException property.
member.param: The message to display to the client when the exception is thrown.
The System.Exception.InnerException , if any, that threw the current exception.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Configuration.ConfigurationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception,System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Configuration.ConfigurationException class with the specified error message and System.Exception.InnerException and the name of the configuration section node that contains the error.
member.param: The message to display to the client when the exception is thrown.
The System.Exception.InnerException , if any, that threw the current exception.
The System.Xml.XmlNode that contains the error.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Configuration.ConfigurationException.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Configuration.ConfigurationException class with the specified error message, the name of the configuration file that contains the error, and the line number in the file.
member.param: The message to display to the client when the exception is thrown.
The name of the configuration file that contains the error.
The number of the line that contains the error.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Configuration.ConfigurationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Configuration.ConfigurationException with the specified error message and System.Exception.InnerException, the name of the file containing the error, and the line number of the error in the file.
member.param: The message to display to the client when the exception is thrown.
The System.Exception.InnerException , if any, that threw the current exception.
The name of the configuration file that contains the error.
The number of the line that contains the error.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Configuration.ConfigurationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Configuration.ConfigurationException with the specified error message and the name of the configuration section containing the error.

The System.Xml.XmlNode that contains the error.

member.summary: Returns configuration settings for a user-defined configuration section.

member.summary: Returns the config object for the specified key.

Application provided context object that gets passed into the Create method of the IConfigurationSectionHandler

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Configuration.IConfigurationSystem.Init
member.summary: Initializes the configuration system.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Configuration.DictionarySectionHandler
member.summary: Reads key-value pair configuration information for a configuration section.

example.code: <add key="name" value="text"> - sets key=text <remove key="name"> - removes the definition of key <clear/> - removes all definitions

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler
member.summary: Defines the contract that all configuration section handlers must implement in order to participate in the resolution of configuration settings. Reads key-value pair configuration information for a configuration section.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler.Create(System.Object,System.Object,System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Implemented by all configuration section handlers to parse the XML of the configuration section. The returned object is added to the configuration collection and is accessed by System.Configuration.ConfigurationSettings.GetConfig(System.String).
member.param: The configuration settings in a corresponding parent configuration section.

An System.Web.Configuration.HttpConfigurationContext when System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler.Create(System.Object,System.Object,System.Xml.XmlNode) is called from the ASP.NET configuration system. Otherwise, this parameter is reserved and is null.
The System.Xml.XmlNode that contains the configuration information from the configuration file. Provides direct access to the XML contents of the configuration section.

member.name: P:OpenNETCF.Configuration.DictionarySectionHandler.KeyAttributeName
member.summary: Make the name of the key attribute configurable by derived classes.

member.name: P:OpenNETCF.Configuration.DictionarySectionHandler.ValueAttributeName
member.summary: Make the name of the value attribute configurable by derived classes.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Configuration.IgnoreSectionHandler
member.summary: Provides a section handler definition for configuration sections read and handled by systems other than OpenNETCF.Configuration.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Configuration.machineconfig
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:OpenNETCF.Configuration.machineconfig.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:OpenNETCF.Configuration.machineconfig.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:OpenNETCF.Configuration.machineconfig.machine_config
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <configSections> <section name="appSettings" type="OpenNETCF.Configuration.NameValueFileSectionHandler, OpenNETCF.Configuration" allowLocation="false" /> <section name="opennetcf.diagnostics" type="OpenNETCF.Diagnostics.DiagnosticsConfigurationHandler, OpenNETCF"/> </configSections> </configuration>.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Configuration.NameValueSectionHandler
member.summary: Provides name-value pair configuration information from a configuration section.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Configuration.SingleTagSectionHandler.Create(System.Object,System.Object,System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Returns a collection of configuration section values.
member.param: The configuration settings in a corresponding parent configuration section.
This parameter is reserved and is null.
An that contains configuration information from the configuration file. Provides direct access to the XML contents of the configuration section.
